name: Salmon and Olives With Linguine
keywords: dairy-free, nut-free, vegetarian, linguine, olives, salmon fillet, main course
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons chopped Greek olives, or other olives packed in brine
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Broil fillets 5 to 7 minutes, depending on thickness.
In hot oil, saute onion and garlic until onion is soft. Add olives and oregano and stir; cook 2 minutes over low heat.
Meanwhile, cook linguine in 4 quarts boiling water until it is al dente. Drain.
Cut salmon into small pieces and add to onion. Reheat and serve mixed with pasta.
Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
